verses.verse: The proverbs <S%H4912><s%> of Solomon. <S%H8010><s%> A wise <S%H2450><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> makes <S%H8055><s%> a father glad, <S%H1><s%> But a foolish <S%H8055><s%> son <S%H3684><s%> is a grief <S%H1121><s%> to his mother. <S%H8424><s%>
Ill-gotten gains <S%H214><s%> do not profit, <S%H3276><s%> But righteousness <S%H6666><s%> delivers <S%H5337><s%> from death. <S%H4194><s%>
The Lord <S%H3068><s%> will not allow the righteous <S%H6662><s%> to hunger, <S%H7456><s%> But He will thrust <S%H1920><s%> [aside] the craving <S%H1942><s%> of the wicked. <S%H7563><s%>
Poor <S%H7326><s%> is he who works <S%H6213><s%> with a negligent <S%H9559><s%> hand, <S%H3709><s%> But the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the diligent <S%H9167><s%> makes <S%H6238><s%> rich. <S%H6238><s%>

He who gathers <S%H103><s%> in summer <S%H7019><s%> is a son <S%H1121><s%> who acts <S%H7919><s%> wisely, <S%H7919><s%> [But] he who sleeps <S%H7290><s%> in harvest <S%H7105><s%> is a son <S%H1121><s%> who acts <S%H954><s%> shamefully. <S%H954><s%>
Blessings <S%H1293><s%> are on the head <S%H7218><s%> of the righteous, <S%H6662><s%> But the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> conceals <S%H3680><s%> violence. <S%H2555><s%>
The memory <S%H2143><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> is blessed, <S%H1293><s%> But the name <S%H8034><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> will rot. <S%H7537><s%>
The wise <S%H2450><s%> of heart <S%H3820><s%> will receive <S%H3947><s%> commands, <S%H4687><s%> But a babbling <S%H8193><s%> fool <S%H191><s%> will be thrown <S%H3832><s%> down. <S%H3832><s%>
He who walks <S%H1980><s%> in integrity <S%H8537><s%> walks <S%H1980><s%> securely, <S%H983><s%> But he who perverts <S%H6140><s%> his ways <S%H1870><s%> will be found <S%H3045><s%> out.
He who winks <S%H7169><s%> the eye <S%H5869><s%> causes <S%H5414><s%> trouble, <S%H6094><s%> And a babbling <S%H8193><s%> fool <S%H191><s%> will be thrown <S%H3832><s%> down. <S%H3832><s%>

The mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> is a fountain <S%H4726><s%> of life, <S%H9132><s%> But the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> conceals <S%H3680><s%> violence. <S%H2555><s%>
Hatred <S%H8135><s%> stirs <S%H5782><s%> up strife, <S%H4090><s%> But love <S%H160><s%> covers <S%H3680><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> transgressions. <S%H6588><s%>

On the lips <S%H8193><s%> of the discerning, <S%H995><s%> wisdom <S%H2451><s%> is found, <S%H4672><s%> But a rod <S%H7626><s%> is for the back <S%H1460><s%> of him who <S%H2638><s%> lacks <S%H2638><s%> understanding. <S%H3820><s%>
Wise <S%H2450><s%> men <S%H2450><s%> store <S%H6845><s%> up knowledge, <S%H1847><s%> But with the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the foolish, <S%H191><s%> ruin <S%H4288><s%> is at hand. <S%H7138><s%>
The rich <S%H6223><s%> man's wealth <S%H1952><s%> is his fortress, <S%H7151><s%> <S%H5797><s%> The ruin <S%H4288><s%> of the poor <S%H1800><s%> is their poverty. <S%H7389><s%>
The wages <S%H6468><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> is life, <S%H9132><s%> The income <S%H8393><s%> of the wicked, <S%H7563><s%> punishment. <S%H9128><s%>

He is [on] the path <S%H734><s%> of life <S%H9132><s%> who heeds <S%H8104><s%> instruction, <S%H4148><s%> But he who forsakes <S%H5800><s%> reproof <S%H9640><s%> goes <S%H8582><s%> astray. <S%H8582><s%>
He who conceals <S%H3680><s%> hatred <S%H8135><s%> [has] lying <S%H8267><s%> lips, <S%H8193><s%> And he who spreads <S%H3318><s%> slander <S%H1681><s%> is a fool. <S%H3684><s%>

When there are many <S%H7230><s%> words, <S%H1697><s%> transgression <S%H6588><s%> is unavoidable, <S%H2308><s%> <S%H3808><s%> But he who restrains <S%H2820><s%> his lips <S%H8193><s%> is wise. <S%H7919><s%>
The tongue <S%H3956><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> is [as] choice <S%H977><s%> silver, <S%H3701><s%> The heart <S%H3820><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> is [worth] little. <S%H4592><s%>
The lips <S%H8193><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> feed <S%H7462><s%> many, <S%H7227><s%> But fools <S%H191><s%> die <S%H4191><s%> for lack <S%H2638><s%> of understanding. <S%H3820><s%>
It is the blessing <S%H1293><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> that makes <S%H6238><s%> rich, <S%H6238><s%> And He adds <S%H3254><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> sorrow <S%H6089><s%> to it.
Doing <S%H6213><s%> wickedness <S%H2154><s%> is like sport <S%H7814><s%> to a fool; <S%H3684><s%> And [so is] wisdom <S%H2451><s%> to a man <S%H376><s%> of understanding. <S%H8394><s%>
What <S%H4034><s%> the wicked <S%H7563><s%> fears <S%H4034><s%> will come <S%H935><s%> upon him, And the desire <S%H8378><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> will be granted. <S%H5414><s%>

When the whirlwind <S%H5492><s%> passes, <S%H5674><s%> the wicked <S%H7563><s%> is no <S%H369><s%> more, <S%H369><s%> But the righteous <S%H6662><s%> [has] an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> foundation. <S%H3247><s%>

Like vinegar <S%H2558><s%> to the teeth <S%H8127><s%> and smoke <S%H6227><s%> to the eyes, <S%H5869><s%> So <S%H3651><s%> is the lazy <S%H6102><s%> one <S%H6102><s%> to those who send <S%H7971><s%> him.
The fear <S%H3374><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> prolongs <S%H3254><s%> life, <S%H3117><s%> But the years <S%H8141><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> will be shortened. <S%H9527><s%>
The hope <S%H8431><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> is gladness, <S%H8057><s%> But the expectation <S%H8615><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> perishes.
The way <S%H1870><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is a stronghold <S%H4581><s%> to the upright, <S%H8537><s%> But ruin <S%H4288><s%> to the workers <S%H6466><s%> of iniquity. <S%H205><s%>
The righteous <S%H6662><s%> will never <S%H5769><s%> <S%H1077><s%> be shaken, <S%H4131><s%> But the wicked <S%H7563><s%> will not dwell <S%H7931><s%> in the land. <S%H776><s%>
The mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> flows <S%H5107><s%> with wisdom, <S%H2451><s%> But the perverted <S%H8419><s%> tongue <S%H3956><s%> will be cut <S%H3772><s%> out.

The lips <S%H8193><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> bring <S%H3045><s%> forth <S%H3045><s%> what <S%H7522><s%> is acceptable, <S%H7522><s%> But the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the wicked, <S%H7563><s%> what <S%H8419><s%> is perverted. <S%H8419><s%>
